thread.section_title: Travel news, tips and features - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Experience the Gold Rush at Columbia State Historic Park
thread.title_full: Experience the Gold Rush at Columbia State Historic Park - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill K. Robinson
title: Experience the Gold Rush at Columbia State Historic Park
text:
Photo: James Tensuan
Mike Maciejewski hammers a small sword at the blacksmith shop at Columbia State Park in Columbia, Calif. on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Columbia has the largest number of gold rush-era buildings.
Mike Maciejewski hammers a small sword at the blacksmith shop at Columbia State Park in Columbia, Calif. on Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. Columbia has the largest number of gold rush-era buildings.
